entity1.name: Spotify
entity1.description: Companies or platforms that provide music content to users over the internet, often through subscription-based models.;;;Companies or platforms that provide music content to users over the internet, allowing them to listen to songs and playlists without downloading.;;;A type of digital service that provides access to music over the internet.;;;A digital music streaming service that provides users with access to millions of songs and podcasts.;;;A method of delivering content over the internet, allowing users to consume audio and video without downloading it.;;;Companies that provide platforms for listening to music over the internet.;;;Digital services or websites that host and provide access to music content.;;;Online platforms that provide music to listeners in exchange for subscriptions or advertisements, paying artists based on the number of streams.;;;Online platforms that provide access to music and other media content through the internet.;;;Online services that allow users to listen to music, watch videos, or access media content over the internet.;;;A method of delivering content over the internet, allowing users to consume multimedia as it is being received rather than waiting for an entire file to download.;;;Online platforms that provide access to a large catalog of music for users, often through subscription-based models.;;;A subscription-based music streaming service provided by Apple Inc., offering a large catalog of songs, albums, and playlists.;;;Companies that provide digital media, such as music and video, over the internet.;;;Companies or platforms that provide music content to users over the internet, often on a subscription basis.;;;A type of digital service that provides access to a large library of music over the internet, allowing users to listen to songs and playlists on demand.;;;Online platforms that provide access to a large library of music for users to listen to, often on a subscription basis.;;;Online services that allow users to access and play media content, such as music or videos, without downloading it. Examples include Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube.;;;Companies or platforms that provide music and other media content to users over the internet, often through subscription-based models.;;;A method of delivering content over the internet, allowing users to consume media without downloading it.;;;Online platforms that provide access to a large library of music over the internet, allowing users to listen to songs on demand or through curated playlists.
